page.title: 13RECREATION IN LYTHE
page.content: The most common recreational pastime is gardening.This is obvious from the many well kept gardens attached to most of the houses and also from the magnificent vegetables etc. displayed in the local show. Other popular interests are the Women's Institute and its various activities,the Young Farmers Club. There are many individual interests such as swimming, dancing,needlecraft,quoits playing, golf,fishing and those who do voluntary social work.Some of the younger villagers are encouraged to go cycling through the club organised by the vicar.
